mapper.select: select no, wid, notitle, to_char(nostartdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') nostartdate, to_char(noenddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') noenddate, target, writedate, ncontent from notice where wid=#{wid} order by no desc
select no, wid, notitle, to_char(nostartdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') nostartdate, to_char(noenddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') noenddate, target, writedate, ncontent from notice where no=#{no}
